name: bubble-beam
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.
